summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個建構函式傳回型別的物件，其中包含對等體的完整限定的名稱。This constructor returns an object of type that contains the fully qualified name of the peer. 此外，它也會指定對等名稱是受保護或不安全。It also specifies whether the peer name is secured or unsecured. 這個執行個體會使用預設的對等識別目前的使用者和指定，除了建立具有指定的分類和類型的對等名稱的類型。This instance uses the default peer identity for the current user and the specified , in addition to the type of peer name to create with the specified classifier and type.

exception.span: 包含一或多個不合法的字元。

span.span: The includes one or more illegal characters.
One or more parameters are .

Docs.exception:
- 無法擷取做為 基礎的預設識別。The Default Identity used as the basis of the could not be retrieved.
- 無法建立 。The could not be created.

MemberSignature.Value: public string Authority { get; }
.property instance string Authority
Public ReadOnly Property Authority As String
public: property System::String ^ Authority { System::String ^ get(); };

summary.span: 傳回字串，指定這個 物件所使用的 。

span.span: Returns a string that specifies the used by this object.

value.span: 字串，內含指定之 的驗證 (Authentication) 部分。

span.span: The string which contains the authentication portion of the specified .

value.span: 如果是受保護的對等名稱，這個屬性會包含長度為 40 個字元之十六進位字串的公開金鑰 (Public Key)。

span.span: For secured peer names, this property contains the public key as a forty-character hexadecimal string.

value.span: 如果是未受保護的對等名稱，這個屬性會設定為零 (0)。

span.span: For unsecured peer names, this property is set to zero (0).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 只有擁有者或對等主機，可以註冊的受保護的對等名稱。Only the owner, or peer host, can register a secured peer name. 「 對等名稱會被視為安全受到自我簽署憑證。A peer name is considered secured if it is backed by a self-signed certificate. 對等名稱為區分大小寫和對等名稱的格式為： *Authority.Classifier*。Peer names are case-sensitive and the format of a peer name is: *Authority.Classifier*. 例如，"0.MyPeerName 」 是語式正確的對等名稱。For example, "0.MyPeerName" is a well-formed peer name.

para.span: 使用安全的對等名稱時，不會保證網路的應用程式的整體安全性。

span.span: Using a secured peer name does not ensure the overall security of the networking application.

para.span: 應用程式的安全性是與實作相依。

span.span: Security of the application is implementation-dependent.

MemberSignature.Value: public string Classifier { get; }
.property instance string Classifier
Public ReadOnly Property Classifier As String
public: property System::String ^ Classifier { System::String ^ get(); };

summary.span: 傳回字串，內含對等 的 Classifier。

span.span: Returns a string that contains the classifier for a peer-to-peer .

value.span: 字串，內含的 Classifier 部分是用於識別 的對等名稱，或 PNRP 內的解析。

span.span: The string which contains the classifier portion used to identify a peer name for or resolution within a PNRP .

value.span: 除非明確指定，否則參考型別 (Reference Type) 的所有屬性預設值為 ，型別為 的屬性則為零 (0)。

span.span: Unless explicitly specified, the default value for all properties is for reference types and zero (0) for properties of type .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 「 對等名稱的格式： *Authority.Classifier*。The format of a peer name is: *Authority.Classifier*. 對等名稱*分類*元件可以設定為任何字串，其中包含都有 149 個 Unicode 字元，包括`null`結束字元 (「 \0")。The peer name *Classifier* component can be set to any string that contains 149 or fewer Unicode characters, including the `null` ("\0") terminator. 對等名稱的字串會區分大小寫。Peer name strings are case-sensitive. 安全的對等名稱，分類器和授權單位之後的點 （期間） 是選擇性的。For secured peer names, the classifier and the dot (period) after the authority are optional. 不安全的對等名稱，分類器不是選擇性的。For unsecured peer names, the classifier is not optional.

MemberSignature.Value: public static System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerName CreateFromPeerHostName (string peerHostName);
.method public static hidebysig class System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerName CreateFromPeerHostName(string peerHostName) cil managed

public: static System::Net::PeerToPeer::PeerName ^ CreateFromPeerHostName(System::String ^ peerHostName);

param.name: peerHostName
param.span: 字串，包含 DNS 限定的主應用程式名稱。

span.span: A string that contains the DNS-qualified host name.

summary.span: 使用指定的對等主應用程式名稱，建立指定之 物件的新執行個體。

span.span: Creates a new instance of the specified object with the specified peer host name.

returns.span: 物件，表示指定的對等主應用程式名稱。

span.span: A object that represents the specified peer host name.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 端對端主機是 「 種子節點 」 負責初始化對等網路工作階段，邀請對等電腦參與應用程式，這種類型的網路連線進行通訊，例如交談群組或遊戲最適合工作階段。The peer-to-peer host is the "seed node" responsible for initiating the peer-to-peer networking session, inviting peers to participate in applications for which this type of network connectivity is most appropriate for communications such as chat groups or game sessions. 這個方法可以用來建立物件根據屬性。This method can be used to create a object based on the property. 這個對等名稱不是節點的呼叫端識別相關聯。This peer name is not associated with the identity of the calling node.

exception.span: 提供的 不是有效的對等主應用程式名稱字串。

span.span: The provided is not a valid peer host name string.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 兩個對等名稱會被視為相等，如果它們包含相同的字元，在其和元件。Two peer names are considered equal if they contain identical characters in their and components. 在比較之前字串上執行不正規化。No normalizations are performed on the strings prior to comparison. 所有的正規化應該完成時或之前建構的對等名稱的物件。All normalization should have been completed while or before constructing the peer name objects.

MemberSignature.Value: public bool IsSecured { get; }
.property instance bool IsSecured
Public ReadOnly Property IsSecured As Boolean
public: property bool IsSecured { bool get(); };

summary.span: 取得布林值，指定這是否為受保護的對等名稱。

span.span: Gets a Boolean value that specifies whether this is a secured peer name.

value.span: 如果為 ，則這個對等名稱會以私密金鑰/公開金鑰組保護。

span.span: If , this peer name is secured with a private key/ public key pair.

value.span: 其名稱會包含該對等電腦的使用者憑證之公開金鑰的安全雜湊演算法 (SHA) 雜湊。

span.span: Its name contains the Secure Hash Algorithm (SHA) hash of the public key of the user certificate of that peer machine.

value.span: 否則，如果為 ，則對等名稱沒有相關聯的識別。

span.span: Otherwise, if , the peer name has no associated identity.

value.span: 除非明確指定，否則參考型別 (Reference Type) 的所有屬性預設值為 ，型別為 的屬性則為零 (0)。

span.span: Unless explicitly specified, the default value for all properties is for reference types and zero (0) for properties of type .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 「 對等名稱會被視為安全受到自我簽署憑證。A peer name is considered secured if it is backed by a self-signed certificate. 只有擁有者可以向 PNRP 安全的對等名稱。Only the owner can register a secured peer name with PNRP.

para.span: 使用安全的對等名稱時，不會保證網路的應用程式的整體安全性。

span.span: Using a secured peer name does not ensure the overall security of the networking application.

para.span: 應用程式的安全性是與實作相依。

span.span: Security of the application is implementation-dependent.

MemberSignature.Value: public string PeerHostName { get; }
.property instance string PeerHostName
Public ReadOnly Property PeerHostName As String
public: property System::String ^ PeerHostName { System::String ^ get(); };

summary.span: 取得對等主機的名稱。

span.span: Gets the name of the peer-to-peer host.

summary.span: 這是 DNS 編碼的 ，相當於 ，因為兩者都是識別項。

span.span: This is a DNS-encoded version of the which is equivalent to a in that they are both identifiers.

summary.span: 兩者之間的差別在於視覺化的表示。

span.span: The difference between the two is visual representation.
A value that is the name of the peer-to-peer host.

value.span: 除非明確指定，否則參考型別 (Reference Type) 的所有屬性預設值都是 。

span.span: Unless explicitly specified, the default value for all properties is for reference types.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 端對端主機是 「 種子節點 」 負責初始化對等網路工作階段，邀請對等電腦參與應用程式，這種類型的網路連線進行通訊，例如交談群組或遊戲最適合工作階段。The peer-to-peer host is the "seed node" responsible for initiating the peer-to-peer networking session, inviting peers to participate in applications for which this type of network connectivity is most appropriate for communications such as chat groups or game sessions. 屬性會指定對等建立之對等網路工作階段，且其被視為工作階段主機的名稱。The property specifies the name of a peer that created the peer-to-peer networking session, and which is considered the host of the session. 對等網路工作階段主機可能會收集對等多個。The host of a peer-to-peer networking session may collect peers into more than one . 此外，對等可能同時裝載多個對等的主機。Also, a peer may simultaneously be hosted by more than one peer host.
